scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true })); process.exit(0);"
scripts.test_headed_chrome: npm run removeOld && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run --spec ./cypress/integration/Testcases/v* --browser chrome --headed --env allure=true --reporter mocha-allure-reporter
scripts.openReports: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
